author: EXM7777
text:
here's the fastest way to succeed in anything:

get people who've made it to roast your work

sounds backwards, i know... but it works surprisingly well

when i started my first agency, i did what everyone does: asked for "feedback" (which is code for "tell me it's great")

got nowhere, everyone was too nice, zero growth

then i flipped the script... paid $500 for 30 mins with a guy doing $100k/month, sent him my entire process and said "rip this apart, don't hold back"

he tore it to shreds in 12 minutes... but those 12 minutes saved me 2 years of trial and error

think about it:
> he saw the bottleneck i was blind to (because i was IN it)
> he fixed my positioning with one sentence that changed everything
> he told me exactly what to cut and where to double down

felt like cheating tbh... still does

now i do this for every business i run, find the person who's already where i want to be, pay them to be brutal with me, and suddenly i'm moving 10x faster than everyone else who's "figuring it out themselves"

the ROI on that $500 is probably 500x by now... and it keeps compounding

invest in roast, it's 100% worth
